post.body: You can do it 'cause ur the Man!
Check it out! Maybe a site you'd like. http://www.goodreads.com/profile/chaos3000
Ok. Got that. But you still may need to rest a bit. Put it on ur calendar. REST. (hopefully you can find the time.)
No, say it ain't so, Jo!
Sweet dreams...
U should go to sleep 2. No need 4 both of us 2B cranky.
I should be asleep. My tweet will be reflective of the crabby mood I'm going 2 B N in the morning. Not gonna be cute.
U have until Tuesday. Keep preparing. (try 2 keep ur food down 2:-) It's not over til the beer @ the bar AFTER the interview.
That site is FREAKIN' HILARIOUS! Had to bookmark it to read when I need a laugh!
You and @debwooldridge are the only folks with that as a dinner dish. You are not alone. I had ramen noodle instead.
that's for letting @jodinescorner know she was not alone, but YUCK!
It's official. We're soul sisters. I got'em too! Umph.
how do u no its crap? I won at a dinner raffle. It's cute.
Sounds like a plan to me! Would love to see my "Brazilan" baby sister. Def have to fill me in about ur new book!
What?! Are you ok?
@Leatrice As always, had a great time! Thanks for coming out!
Great! However, we do expect more details when you get settled.
Now that's more like it!!!!! Hope it goes well today. Charm them w/ur brilliance and wit. Ok maybe not wit:-P
Loved it! Although it was recycled.
Funnier than u can imagine. He'll try to ask me about my dating life soon as if he knows something. then we'll do again next visit
thanks. Made it back to Flo-town in one piece.
Home, sweet home after a lovely fundraising event.
has to make a quick stop before heading over to the Big Bro Big Sis fundraiser at Ten Pin Alley.
want to read: The Zahir: A Novel of Obsession
reading When You Are Engulfed in Flames
want to read: Can You Keep a Secret?
really wants to throw my alarm clock out of window. Such a fickle invention:-P
just finished reading Remember Me? by Kinsella. Pretty good, easy read. Now sleep.
is still awake reading. Too much Caffeined tea w/dinner.
is about to send out a few emails and get back to mybook. (I think I ate too much at Pappadeaux for dinner w/my internal clients. ugh)
RT@nprpolitics Illinois Gov. Blagojevich Arrested On Corruption Charges; Whither The Obama Senate Appointment? http://bit.ly/q3s8 STUPID!
SERIOUSLY: RT @politicalticker 'Nanny' state: Fran Drescher seeks Clinton's Senate seat http://tinyurl.com/5jegej
Waking up @ 3am plus exhaustion equals 2 many snooze button hits. Umph.
Time to get oil change, purchase wine for hosts for tonights parties, clean a little, all AFTER having a cup of jo.
is "manning" a table for AID Atlanta at the SW Regional Library health fair. Come check it out!
is (almost) awake. Gotta prepare for hosting AID Atlanta booth this (very cold) morning. Brrrrrr.
is going to take one more look @ tonight's amazing full moon. It's so beautiful!
is back home from a wonderful celebration of friendship.
is getting ready to my girl's sisterhood celebration.
ok folks. @jodinescorner wants me to ask if anyone has ever eaten spagetti and ketchup as a meal? Anyone?
Dang it! Wasabi closed until 5! Where to now?!
Sushi time! I'm SO excited!
is waiting.
Time to get ready. Looking forward taking Happy Ending! Yum! Sushi, that is.
$15B to hold up auto industry for a MONTH? Really!?
finally got both eyes open after a minor coma-kinda' sleep. Yea, it's sunny TGIFriday too! What to do? What to do?
has an unused flip camcorder for 2-3 years. Need to take it out of the closet to tape, well, something. Need ideas.
Sunshine, Moonlight, Good times, Blame it on the boogie! Vacation starts at 6pm today! *doing running man dance*
enjoyed a fab night of sushi, sake and wine w/the girls. Time to prepare 4 my last day of wk b4 vacation. Nighty night.
is sitting in Wasabi w/a big smile on my face:-)))
have way too much on my mind. Must have sushi and sake to think it though.
is so thankful for colleagues who truly understand the need for POST-coffee conversation.
No, not yet. 10 more mins.
watched my fav show, address 40+ Xmas/hoilday cards, completed Xmas shopping, played a game of sudoku and is calling it a night. *yawn*
Long day of clerical BS. I'm out.
Why do I sometimes feel like the longer I do this job, the less I learn. I'm regressing, not progressing. Maybe I'm just crabby. Hope so...
don't remember this many press conferences from any other pres-elect. Did I miss something or were the rest of them slackers?
is wondering what's going on.
want to read: In His Own Words: BARACK OBAMA - THE AMERICAN PROMISE: 500+ pages. The Speeches 2007 + 2008
is counting down. 3 days before my 2 wk vacation begins. Yea
is done w/sudoku for the night. Well maybe one more game. Tweet u in the a.m.
is feeding her sudoku addiction and losing. What gives!?
Catching on a few news stories. Puff the Magic Negro? Seriously?! RNC, no one thought that was a bad idea? Really?
is at home, at last.
is off to holiday party #2 b4 crashing and burning.
watching Obama on 60 mins.
is back in the A preparing for football night w/friends.
is heading home.
just got back from having a late or really early breakfast w/Deb and Fay. Must fast when I get back to the A.
remembers why I left home @ 17. College, home 4 6mths, then Atl. Too much food and attention and too little mental stimulation.
tackled Super Walmart and now know why I don't go. Went to Thurderbird for lunch. Nothing like fried fatback on a buffet. Luv country livin'
is finally going to sleep.
just picked up mom from the lounge where she works as House Lady. (No, not a brothel) Parents are truly night owls. *yawn*
had to switch rooms. Dad asking me if I'm okay every ten mins and too many pics of me. Like a chaosinga museum. The life of an only child.
Fried shrimp and onion rings are going to make me pay later. grease is foreign to my system, but it's so good!
Took my dad only a few mins b4 asking about all my exs. New record. The answer is the same: Don't no. umph
Dad and are doing what? Watching House. Love it!
is in Flo-town w/the folks.
is on the road again...
